item.title: Allyson add a quote by George R.R. Martin
item.description: "There's no shame in fear, my father told me, what matters is how we face it." -- George R.R. Martin

item.title: Allyson add a quote by Robert Jordan
item.description: "I will hate the man you choose because he isn't me, and love him if he makes you smile." -- Robert Jordan

item.title: Allyson add a quote by David Stahler Jr.
item.description: "The best people in life make the world a bigger place, then help you grow to fit it." -- David Stahler Jr.

item.title: Allyson add a quote by Neil Gaiman
item.description: "The young woman was crying, in the way that grownups cry, keeping it inside as much as they can, and hating it when it still pushes out at the edges, making them ugly and funny-looking on the way." -- Neil Gaiman

item.title: Allyson add a quote by Neil Gaiman
item.description: "He wondered whether home was a thing that happened to a place after a while, or if it was something that you found in the end, if you simply walked and waited and willed it long enough." -- Neil Gaiman

item.title: Allyson add a quote by Neil Gaiman
item.description: "He had noticed that events were cowards: they didn't occur singly, but instead they would run in packs and leap out at him all at once." -- Neil Gaiman

item.title: Allyson add a quote by Neil Gaiman
item.description: "I believe in absolute honesty and sensible social lies." -- Neil Gaiman

item.title: Allyson add a quote by Neil Gaiman
item.description: "It was a dream, and in dreams you have no choices: either there are no decisions to be made, or they were made for you long before ever the dream began." -- Neil Gaiman
